messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Robin
messages.msgSnippet: Thank you for such a thoughtful reply.  I am scheduled to observe a whole morning at the preschool next week and hope that will help me sort out whether it
messages.messageBody:
Thank you for such a thoughtful reply. I am scheduled to observe a whole
morning at the preschool next week and hope that will help me sort out
whether it would be a good idea. The thought keeps occuring to me that I
just want help in my parenting responsibility to teach order, cleanup,
respect for others, etc.

I would be absolutely delighted to know someone who has homeschooled
triplets. Please ask her to contact me directly if she has a minute to
breathe. And thank you in advance.
